hadiths.text: It was narrated that Khawlah bin Hakim said:"I asked the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) about a woman who has a wet dream and he said: 'If she sees water, let her perform Ghusl

chapter.ara-name: باب غُسْلِ الْمَرْأَةِ تَرَى فِي مَنَامِهَا مَا يَرَى الرَّجُلُ
chapter.eng-name: The Ghusl Of A Woman Who Sees Something In Her dream Like A Man Sees
